phrases: I want to send them to you today
The suddenly serious look I see in your profile
Makes my heart race faster and faster
Every time I look at you, my heart is pounding
I want to be closer to you
Please notice before this sweet premonition melts
I want to be special to you
Why is that the only way you can handle things?
I just created a world where nobody gets hurt.
My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU TOO!
After the cultural and athletic festivals ended with no major problems,
and a wind better described as cold than cool blew through.
For that matter, it is even more bitterly cold around me.
Also, my name is not even Hikitani.
You are coming to club today, right?
Okay, I will see you there!
I heard we are going to be picking groups for
the field trip in our next long homeroom.
I would say everyone is pretty much decided already, though.
I want to protect this smile!
Want to be in the same group, then?
Going off on your own like that...
At least let me go to the bathroom by myself.
Also, you use that joke too much, Tobe.
Yeah, go overboard with that and you will flop.
It is bound Tobe a flop!
I do not like hot stuff...
You know, I wish our school could have gone to Okinawa, too.
What is there to do in Kyoto, anyway?
There are plenty of things to do.
Like seeing and experiencing Japan's culture firsthand...
I do not think that is what it is about.
Why are we going on this field trip, then?
It is an imitation of social living.
On a business trip with your superior,
you do not get to choose where you stay or what you have for dinner.
This trains you to fool yourself into thinking that by compromising,
you get some enjoyment out of it.
I bet you are no fun to go on a field trip with, Hikki.
There must be something you two are looking forward to.
I have not looked into it at all yet.
Well, I am looking forward to seeing Ryouanji and Kiyomizudera,
but I would also like to see famous places like Rokuonji and Jishouji.
That sounds like some cool name for a character.
I suppose Kinkaku and Ginkaku are their more common names.
Then why did not you just call them that?
I think that is about it.
I think she is a little too excited about this...
Is not familiarity with Kyoto considered common knowledge?
Now's the time to visit Kyoto!!
Do you have business with us?
He wanted some help, so I brought him here.
Wait, I do not think I can ask Hikitani-kun for help, after all.
We are the ones who came to ask for help.
Yeah, but you know, I cannot tell Hikitani-kun about stuff like this.
He does not seem trustworthy at all.
Then, forgive my asking, but would you leave?
Okay, call me whenever you are done with stuff.
I was asking them to leave.
No manners, no sense of propriety.
I do not see why we need to do any favors for someone like that.
I would appreciate it if you would leave right away.
Yeah, you are kind of rude!
We should figure this out ourselves.
No, I cannot back out of this now!
So basically, you want to ask Ebina-san to go out with you?
It would hurt to get rejected, you know?
You do not want to get rejected, huh...
I love that sort of thing!
I guess it will not be that easy, huh?
Sorry, but it looks like we cannot be of any help.
Do not try to force this decision on me.
You are trying to look polite,
but you lapped yourself and just ended up more impolite.
And you are still getting my name wrong.
Yukinon, this is really bothering Tobecchi.
Well, if you insist, I will think about it.
You are a bit too soft on Yuigahama-san lately.
All right, let us do this.
So, what exactly do you want us to do?
Well, you know, I tell her I like her, right?
So you help me do that?
Okay, it is clear what you are after.
But is not that a little risky?
It means there is a possibility of danger or loss.
I meant, what kind of risk?
It is a given that the whole class will know about it the next day.
If they just know about it, that is fine,
but you will hear it from all around...
Hey, I heard Hikigaya told Kaori he liked her.
I am glad I did not give him my address!
He would not say that to you.
Then you will come up in their merry little conversations.
There is a risk that you will be slightly hurt.
You were talking about yourself again.
Such as, what happens after you tell someone you are friends
We will take care of that part.
Well, I have got to get to my club.
So, let us start by looking for Tobe-kun's good points.
You are already relying on someone else!
If cheerfulness were enough, bald guys could be popular.
Instead of looking for Tobe's good points,
let us try appealing to what Ebina-san likes.
By the way, how does Ebina-san feel about Tobe-kun?
Looks like we have got our answer.
You totally got me all curious!
You know what this is, right?
Nah, I cannot move forward if I do not know the answer to that!
She thinks you are a nice guy...
When a girl says a guy is nice,
that means she could not care less about him.
That is a plus for me, right?
The only plus here is your outlook.
You get a good mood going while we are exploring Kyoto!
Hina said she likes Kyoto, so I think it will work!
That means we will have to create a situation in which Tobe-kun
And Yukinoshita-san and Hikitani-kun, hello, hello!
I wanted to talk to you about Tobecchi...
really well with Hayato-kun and Hikitani-kun lately,
and I think it is making Ohoka-kun and Yamato-kun frustrated!
I want to see more depraved relationships between them!
This is ruining their triangle heart!
Tobecchi's been talking to Hikitani-kun a lot lately, right?
Listen, if you are going to invite someone,
I wish you would invite all of them.
And then accept all of them.
To cut to the chase, I want you to seduce them.
Well, it feels like that whole group is not the same now.
But there is some complicated stuff that goes on between guys, is not there?
No, what you said was perfectly respectable.
But it is definitely something that is never happened before,
and I guess I do not like that.
I want them to get along as well as they always have.
Oh, but I think it would be great if you would get along with them, too, Hikitani-kun!
It would be a feast for my eyes, too.
Well, I will be looking forward to some...
tasty developments on the field trip.
Anyway, we just need to make sure they can all get along, right?
But, Hikki, how do guys get to be friends?
Do not you think it is a bit cruel to ask that of Hikigaya-kun?
Yuigahama-san, try to be a little more considerate, okay?
Nozomi 19 9:10 Hakata Unreserved seats in cars 1-3 Out of Service 701 Out of service.
Okay, Hina can sit there, and Tobecchi can sit next to...
Kawasaki-san, you are across from me.
N-No, I will sit somewhere el
Tobecchi's so freaked out with Kawasaki-san next to him,
he cannot keep up a conversation at all.
Saki-san, do you think a window seat or an aisle seat is more uke?
Hina-chan is even more incredible than usual, though...
That is a disaster for Tobe, too.
I hope they will have time to be alone...
I do not think anything would happen if those two were alone, though.
But I found out about it over summer break, in Chiba Village.
I actually think Ebina-san's pretty cool.
You know, innocent moves like that
will give most guys the wrong idea
and put them in a position no better than death.
If you understand that, never touch a guy,
sit in a guy's chair during breaks or after school,
or borrow from a guy if you forget something, ever again.
I am going to get back to my seat.
Did you forget we have work to do?
I already called Tobecchi and Hina!
Your senses will be sharpened as you proceed through the darkness, relying only on a rope to guide you.
Eventually you will find the Sanskrit word for womb glowing faintly in a stone, and your heart will feel calm.
Turn the stone and pray, then continue to walk forward into the sunlight to feel as if your mind and body have been reborn.
If we all go in at different times, they can be alone, right?
Okay, let us go through here in pairs!
Yumiko and Hayato-kun can go first.
We do not have much time,
so we probably should not leave too much space between us.
Yeah, but this does not look like it will take long, so it should be fine.
Well, you cannot go wrong in getting back early.
C'mon, let us just go, Hayato.
See you guys on the other side.
Man, it is seriously dark in here!
This is as dark as dark gets!
We are supposed to turn this stone and make a wish.
Did you decide what to wish for?
Okay, let us turn it together.
That is what you do at a shrine.
Your Love Fortune God of Marriage Jishu Shrine, Kyoto
Hey, but y'know what that means.
It can only go up from here, so it is good, right?
If you are going to tie it on, the higher you put it, the better.
Glad I had a guy around.
He is trying pretty hard, even without our help.
I hope it will keep going so well.
You think everyone is wishing for romance?
Y-You do not have to worry about that...
Besides, if I drank from that, I would not notice how it tasted at all.
Only in Kyoto Pan-san the Panda
That is what you should have said a second ago.
Felt uncomfortable in your room, so you ran away?
If I ran away over that, I would not go on field trips.
The topic of conversation among my classmates turned toward me.
Why do they enjoy talking about things like that?
But if they are talking about you, does not it mean they are interested in you?
Why do not you make friends with them?
You say that as if it is no problem of yours,
but it is all because of what you did at the cultural festival.
How is that service request going?
Neither good nor bad, I guess.
Sorry I cannot help very much, since I am in a different class.
I am in their class, and I have not done a thing.
It was certainly an intense flavor.
But why did we have to come with you?
Should a teacher be doing this?
That is why I bought your silence with ramen.
That is an even worse thing for a teacher to do.
If you are caught, you will get in trouble.
Being scolded is not a bad thing.
It means someone is looking out for you.
I am looking out for you guys, too,
so make all the mistakes you want.
I am going to buy some liquor for the party.
If you walk that far behind, you will get lost again.
You could just go on ahead.
I do not see much point in that.
Maybe you do not, but it bothers me.
Nobody Knows Why They Came to the Service Club.
Guess I will head back and take a bath...
02 His and Her Love Confessions Will Reach No One.
Is there anywhere you would like to go, Hachiman?
Well, no matter where we go, we will be together...
Or I should say, as long as we are together, anywhere's great.
That is just like you, Hachiman.
I think I would like to see Studio Park and Arashiyama.
I want to protect this sleeping face!
